column4: how do i uninstall ubuntu? there is some problem when i dual boot it and i need to uninstall it

hello Gnea.. i was trying to dual boot my system with ubuntu and windows. i started by installing ubuntu first, but after i install windows later, ubuntu doesnt seem to work. i think i'll try by installing windows first then ubuntu. so now i need a clean system to start on with. but how do i remove ubuntu off?
Use the first link there, and you'll get Ubuntu back
yep there's a problem with grub actually. but even if thats solved, i dont think windows work
